answers.answer: Are you.dizzy too? How far along are you?
I had a friend who went to the er with an unbearable headache and it turned out her blood pressure had sky rocketed. I'm not tryin to scare you
If it's absolutly unbearable, I'd def go in! Are you seeing spots?
She ended up in the hospital with seizures and delivered her baby 7 weeks early. I'm not saying that's what it is, just that bad headaches can be a sign of preeclampsia
have you tried laying in a quiet, dark room and put a cold washcloth or towel on your face?/ helps me when i get my migranes
Take some tylenol hopefully it helps some

its not a migraine or a muscle pain that i can massage out. Its like deep into my neck. It feels like a pinching pain. Like someone is just squeezing the nerve. i put an ice pack under my head where the pain is and its sorta helping but not really ): i don't see spots and I'm not dizzy or anything else. Just this pain )':

Oh and i just got a check up yesterday(Monday). my doctor said my blood pressure looked great and our heart rates were prefect. i took some Tylenol and fell asleep for a few hours and woke up incredibly nauseous and now i can't fall back asleep ):

question: I'm on the verge of putting my had through a wall. This headache is quite possibly the worst headache I've ever had. It's not like the migraines i usually get. The pain is so uncomfortable, it's making me sick. idk what to do. Please someone help me. Im crying my eyes out. This hurts so bad
title: please someone help me )':
